name: Spatial Shift
description: Space is the blank canvas of all creation, stretched infinite by the many hands of the Creator.
effect: Followers of Palkia may call upon 'Spatial Shift' once per quest as a bonus action, allowing them to alter the initiative order for themselves, an ally, or an enemy. This boon must be used at the start of the round, once initiative has been rolled. At High Priest(ess), gain 2 uses.
